title: Himi 155
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Pea ‘oku monū’ia
Mo e loto ‘ofa
He te nau ma’u ‘a e ‘ofa
‘I honau ‘Otua.
2.
Mo e loto ma’a foki,
‘Oku nau mālie
He te nau mamata lelei,
Ki honau ‘Otua.
3.
Pea monū’ia mo e
Fa’a fakalelei,
Ko e fānau kinautolu,
‘A hotau ‘Otua.
4.
Pea ko e kakai foki,
Kuo fakatanga’i;
‘I he’enau angalelei,
‘Oku monū’ia.
5.
Pea ko e pule’anga
Tonu ‘o e langi,
‘Oku ‘onautolu ia
Ke nau mo’ui ai.
6.
Mo e kau manukia,
Mo e lohiaki;
Mo e fehi’anekina,
Mo e fakatanga’i.
7.
‘Oku mou mo’ua lahi ai,
Ko e’uhi ko au
Ke mou fiemālie ai,
Pea nekeneka.
8.
He te mou ma’u ‘i he langi,
‘A homou totongi,
Pea ‘e monū’ia ai,
Homou laumālie. *
